name: unraid-guardian
description: Unraid Config Guardian is a self-hosted utility that monitors and backs up Unraid configuration files, helping detect changes and protect server settings from accidental loss.
features: Configuration backup: Automatically backup Unraid configuration files on a schedule.
Change detection: Monitor configuration files for changes and alert when modifications occur.
Version history: Maintain historical versions of configuration files for rollback capability.
Automated monitoring: Run continuously to detect and backup configuration changes automatically.
Restore capability: Restore previous configuration versions when needed for recovery.
Alert notifications: Send alerts when configuration changes are detected for security awareness.
Scheduled backups: Configure backup frequency to balance protection with storage usage.
File comparison: Compare current configuration with previous versions to identify changes.
Unraid integration: Designed specifically for Unraid servers with knowledge of critical config files.
Disaster recovery: Protect against accidental configuration loss or corruption.
Lightweight operation: Run with minimal impact on server resources.
Simple setup: Install and configure quickly to start protecting your Unraid configuration.
